channel.title: Purechaos - Instant PK 24/7 | Spawn and PK
channel.description:
[center][img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/banner.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.purechaosrsps.com/play.php]Play now[/url] | [url=http://purechaosrsps.com/Purechaos%20Launcher.jar]Download client [Recommended][/url] | [url=http://www.purechaosrsps.com/highscores/]Highscores[/url] | [url=http://www.purechaosrsps.com]Website[/url] | [url=http://www.purechaosrsps.com/forum/]Forums[/url]
Purechaos is a server focussed around Pk & PvM. To support this we have a [b]spawntab[/b] with a wide range of spawnable sets and items along with multiple pk places, minigames and bosses that have to do with combat and PvM.
[b]We are using unique custom maps that are made for a Pk server[/b] Pking and Multi pking are all located at home!
The perfect server for anyone that wants to login and start Pking or PvMing [b]without[/b] hassle of training!
Features
• Login and Pk/PvM • Spawntab with a wide array of spawns • PK Highscores • Unique custom maps (look pictures down below) • Lag free, located on a solid USA host. • A new skill called 'Pking', gain pking XP if you kill someone. • Quick prayers • Full Clanchat with ranks, banning members and kicking! • Active Pk community • Activity Points for being online • Vote4Reward with a twist! • PvP worlds • Loyalty titles that you can unlock! Achievement system with it.
... and lots of features more!
[b]Pictures[/b]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/cmaps.png[/img]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/ags.png[/img]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/tabs.png[/img]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/clan.png[/img]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/active.png[/img]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/title.png[/img]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/shop.png[/img]
[img]http://purechaosrsps.com/images/pking.png[/img]
[/center]

Purechaos is a server focussed around Pk & PvM.
To support this we have a spawntab with a wide range of spawnable sets and items along with multiple pk places, minigames and bosses that have to do with combat and PvM.

We are using unique custom maps that are made for a Pk server
Pking and Multi pking are all located at home!

The perfect server for anyone that wants to login and start Pking or PvMing without hassle of training!

Features

• Login and Pk/PvM
• Spawntab with a wide array of spawns
• PK Highscores
• Unique custom maps (look pictures down below)
• Lag free, located on a solid USA host.
• A new skill called ‘Pking’, gain pking XP if you kill someone.
• Quick prayers
• Full Clanchat with ranks, banning members and kicking!
• Active Pk community
• Activity Points for being online
• Vote4Reward with a twist!
• PvP worlds
